title: White Apache (1987) Spaghetti Western - Based on a true story Directed Bruno Mattei

sources.title: White Apache (1987) Spaghetti Western - Based on a true story Directed Bruno Mattei
sources.description:
When a group of outlaws attack and destroy a wagon train, the only survivor gives birth to a baby, whom the Indian chief, White Bear brings up as his son and calls him Shining Sky. Shining Sky grows up with the chief’s son Black Wolf and by a stroke of fate kills his best friend and brother.

Original title: Bianco Apache (1987) Alternative titles: White Apache / Apache Kid 

Watch the members only uncensored version: https://youtu.be/nysrk65rF3Q


Directors: Claudio Fragasso, Bruno Mattei
Writers: José María Cunillés, Francesco Prosperi
Genres: Drama, Horror, Western

Main Cast:
Sebastian Harrison - Shining Sky
Lola Forner - Rising Sun
Alberto Farnese - The Governor
Charly Bravo - Ryder
Cinzia De Ponti - Isabella
Charles Borromel - Crazy Bull
José Canalejas - White Bear
Luciano Pigozzi - Cribbens


00:00 Full movie (with English & French & Spanish audio options)
03:45 Chief White Bear discovers and adopts a young white child after a tragic raid.
12:18 Shining Sky and Black Wolf compete fiercely in a traditional Apache horse race.
24:37 Rising Star captivates both Shining Sky and Black Wolf during the tribal celebration.
35:52 Shining Sky confronts Ryder's men who threaten the Apache hunting grounds.
48:15 Black Wolf challenges Shining Sky's loyalty to the tribe during a heated argument.
59:33 Ryder's raiders attack the Apache village, forcing Shining Sky to choose between two worlds.
1:12:40 Shining Sky and Black Wolf unite to defend their tribe against the final assault.


 @CultCinemaClassics
